title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 304.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 304.2 - Application

State Regulations

These regulations shall apply only to those retired persons
to be employed in a position in the professional service. Any retired persons
to be employed in a position not in the professional service shall be so
employed in accordance with the provisions of the act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
304.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
